SEARCH
Package com.example.queueup.controllers

Class EventController

java.lang.Object
com.example.queueup.controllers.EventController
public class EventController extends Object
Controller class for handling events in the Event Lottery System. Manages event creation, registration, announcements, and other event-related operations.
